dialogStrings:
Choco Bill
“Thinking of crossing the marshes?”{PAUSE}{CHOICE}Yeah
{CHOICE}Not interested

Choco Bill
“Hmm, then it'll probably be
safer for you to get a Chocobo.”

Choco Bill
“That way you can zip through
the marshes with the Chocobo.”{PAUSE}“It's the only way to avoid being attacked
by the Midgar Zolom.”

Choco Bill
“Midgar Zolom…?”

Choco Bill
“It's a serpent-like creature
over 30 feet tall!!”

Choco Bill
“It detects the footsteps of
anyone in the marshes.”

Choco Bill
“And then, BAM!! It attacks!!!”

Choco Bill
“To avoid that, buy a Chocobo at
me and Choco Billy's Chocobo Farm.”{PAUSE}“To purchase a Chocobo,
please talk to my grandson.
He's in the Chocobo stables at
the far right end of the farm.”

Choco Bill
“By the way, there was another person
heading towards the {CYAN}Marshes{WHITE}.”{PAUSE}“Without a Chocobo, the Midgar Zolom
probably got him.
It was a man in a black cape.”

Choco Bill
“Welcome.”

Choco Bill
“How 'bout a Chocobo Lure Materia?”{PAUSE}“Each level it increases,
makes it easier for you to
find a Chocobo.”

Choco Bill
“Hmm, then, I guess that's that.”

Choco Bill
“Still want to cross the Marshes?”{PAUSE}{CHOICE}Yeah
{CHOICE}No

Choco Bill
“Looking for an Inn?”
{CHOICE}Yeah
{CHOICE}Not interested

Choco Bill
“Looking for an Inn?
{CHOICE}Yup
{CHOICE}Nope

Choco Bill
“Looking for a place to stay?”
{CHOICE}Right
{CHOICE}Nope

Choco Bill
“How about 100 gil a night…?”
{CHOICE}All right
{CHOICE}I'm in a hurry

Choco Bill
“Thank you for your patronage.”

Choco Bill
“…
Ummm, you don't have enough…”
Please <fe><dd>   for a second.
Chocobo farm

Choco Bill
“Oh, what is that?”
What has this world come to?
Stars falling, what's next?”

Choco Bill
“With things the way they are now,
how 'bout raising a Chocobo?”{PAUSE}“No, I'm not trying to persuade
you for money. It's just because
of the way things are in the world.”{PAUSE}“I thought that it would be a
healthy thing for you
to raise some Chocobos…”

Choco Bill
“Hmm…You just happen to be in luck!”{PAUSE}“It just so happens that we aren't
taking care of any Chocobos
for anyone else, so…”

Choco Bill
“I could take care of 6 Chocobos right now,
for 10000 gil per Chocobo.
How 'bout it?”

{CHOICE}Take care of my Chocobos
{CHOICE}Tell me something else
{CHOICE}How do you raise them?
{CHOICE}Nothing

{CHOICE}Could you take care of the Chocobos?
{CHOICE}I'd like to hear about something else
{CHOICE}Tell me how you raise them
{CHOICE}That's all

{CHOICE}Take care of my Chocobos
{CHOICE}I wanna hear about something else
{CHOICE}How do ya raise 'em?
{CHOICE}That's enough

Choco Bill
“To raise a Chocobo, you'll need a
'Chocobo Stable'.”{PAUSE}“And they rent for 10000 gil.
Currently, I can rent out up to 6
'Chocobo Stables'.”{PAUSE}“If you rent a 'Chocobo Stable',
we will keep up to 4 of the Chocobos you
catch in the fenced area outside.”{PAUSE}“At a later date, you can select the Chocobo
that you would like to put in your
'Chocobo Stable'.”

Choco Bill
“'Chocobo Stables' cost 10000 gil…”{PAUSE}{CHOICE}Rent it
{CHOICE}Don't need it

Choco Bill
“We don't have enough room to
rent out more than 6 here…”

Choco Bill
“Thank you.”{PAUSE}“My grandson takes care of the Chocobos.
He's in the Chocobo Stable at the far
right of the farm.
Please tell him what you want.”

Choco Bill
“Someone once told me there is a
'Chocobo Sage'…somewhere.”{PAUSE}“He seems to know how to
raise some great Chocobos.”{PAUSE}“If he really does exist,
I'd like to meet him someday.”

Choco Bill
“Chocobos aren't hard to take care of.”{PAUSE}“The day-to-day care will all be done
here.”{PAUSE}“But, please buy the food for the
Chocobo, and feed them yourselves.”{PAUSE}“Chocobo's abilities will differ
with what you feed it, so feel
free to choose your own food.”{PAUSE}“Also, if you're able to find a male and
a female Chocobo that like each other,
they'll produce an egg.
But only if you feed them a 'Nut'.”{PAUSE}“New Chocobos inherit the
abilities of their parents.”{PAUSE}“I've heard that sometimes new breeds
of Chocobo are born with special
abilities. I've never actually
seen it before, though.”
